title: 基本的な例
分類子の宣言
矢印の見た目を変える
uml:
@startuml
Alice -> Bob: Regular arrow
Alice --> Bob: Dashed arrow
Alice ->> Bob: Open arrow
Alice -\ Bob: Arrow with a line break
Alice -[#red]> Bob: Arrow with a color
@enduml

title: ライフラインの活性化
uml:
@startuml
autoactivate on
alice -> bob : hello
bob -> bob : self call
bill -> bob #005500 : hello from thread 2
bob -> george ** : create
return done in thread 2
return rc
bob -> george !! : delete
return success
@enduml
